synopsis.text: After fending off an invasion from the mysterious Neighbors, the defense organization Border prepares an expedition into the Neighbors' dimension. Multiple squads aim to secure spots on this high-stakes mission by competing in internal rankings battles. Osamu Mikumo's squad, which includes Neighbor ally Yūma Kuga and Osamu's childhood friend Chika Amatori, fights to reach A-rank status for a chance to join the expedition. However, a new attack threatens Border's plans. Elite agents race to defend the vital expedition ship from this latest Neighbor incursion. With ranks in flux and lives on the line, the expedition's fate remains uncertain. Through teamwork and determination, Osamu's squad continues striving to earn their place on the crucial mission into the Neighbors' world. Yet growing dangers from repeated Neighbor assaults test Border’s limits. In this high-pressure environment, each agent battles for the future security of their own dimension.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
